short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize your new tab with a URL, solid color or custom HTML - all in a lightweight, offline Chrome Extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Customize your new tab page in many ways - all in a lightweight, offline Chrome Extension!

Set your new tab page to redirect to any URL, including local files, choose from a variety of URL's such as Common URL's and Chrome Default Pages or 
...set your own custom URL
...choose a solid color and colorize your new tab page!
...set your New Tab as custom HTML!

Report Issues to: https://forms.gle/vKTtENzDhAuorCYg9
